mapper.sql: cm.cms_id, cm.shop_id, cm.item_id, cm.item_type, cm.sort, cm.title, cm.text_comment, cm.list_json, cm.content_html, cm.comment, cm.deleted, cm.update_user_id, cm.update_time, cm.insert_user_id, cm.insert_time, cm.item_url, cm.goods_id_flag
mapper.select: select max(cm.sort) as sort from public.cms_master cm where cm.deleted = '0'
select , ci.item_type as cms_item_type, ci.item_name as item_name, ci.item_code from public.cms_master cm left join cms_items ci on ci.item_id = cm.item_id where cm.cms_id = #{cmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select , cm.item_id as cms_id_parent, '1' as level from public.cms_master cm where cm.deleted = '0' order by cm.sort

select cm.item_id,ci.item_id as cms_id, '0' as cms_id_parent, ci.item_name as title, ci.sort, '0' as level from public.cms_master cm left join cms_items ci on ci.item_id = cm.item_id group by cm.item_id, ci.item_id, ci.item_name order by ci.insert_time

select cmg.cms_gds_id as cms_id, cmg.cms_id as cms_id_parent, gm.goods_name as title, cmg.sort, '2' as level from public.cms_master cm inner join cms_master_goods cmg on cmg.cms_id = cm.cms_id inner join gds_master gm on cmg.goods_id = gm.goods_id order by cmg.sort

select
from public.cms_master cm left join cms_items ci on ci.item_id = cm.item_id where ci.item_code = #{itemCode} and cm.deleted = '0' order by cm.sort

select
from public.cms_master cm left join cms_items ci on ci.item_id = cm.item_id where ci.item_id = #{itemId} and cm.deleted = '0' order by cm.sort

select cm.* from cms_items ci1 inner join cms_items ci2 on ci2.item_id_parent = ci1.item_id inner join cms_items ci3 on ci3.item_id_parent = ci2.item_id left join cms_master cm on cm.item_id = ci3.item_id where ci1.item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ci1.deleted = '0' and ci2.deleted = '0'
